snippet: The British Parliament called on Rupert Murdoch to discuss recorded comments he made to journalists and newspaper executives in March about the culture of paying off police.
abstract: British Parliament calls on News Corp owner Rupert Murdoch to discuss recorded comments he made to journalists and newspaper executives in March about the culture of paying off police; nearly all the journalists had been questioned for hacking and other illegal news-gathering practices.
lead_paragraph: The British Parliament called on Rupert Murdoch to discuss recorded comments he made to journalists and newspaper executives in March about the culture of paying off police.

headline.main: Parliament Asks Murdoch to Discuss Hacking
headline.print_headline: Parliament Asks Murdoch to Discuss Hacking

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
